item.description:
The Annual Newburyport Cocktail Competition is the definition of “no-brainer.” An upscale cocktail crawl, with sampling of signature cocktails from downtown Newburyport's finest restaurants ,food pairing and meeting new folks at each stop. Accompanied by a wrap up party where you get to vote for your favorite signature cocktail. All to be enjoyed on Sunday September 16th. Your price: 20 bucks.
Like we said: no-brainer...





What: Complimentary cocktail tasting.

When: Sunday September 16th, 4-8 p.m.

Where:  Multiple downtown Newburyport restaurants all within walking distance.

 

 

Participants Include: Ten Center Restaurant, The RockFish,  Ceia and Michael's Harborside, Brown Sugar By The Sea, Oregano's Pizzeria and more...

 

Check in will be at the Michael's Harborside at 4:00 PM. Tickets are $20 in advance/$30 at door and cane purchased at www.newburyportcocktail.com for more information on this event go to www.newburyportcocktail.com.
item.name: Newburyport Cocktail Competition-updated restaurant list and meetup location
